title: Brown Rice Breakfast Bowl
directions: In a medium saucepan set over medium-low heat, combine almond milk, maple syrup, almond butter, dates, and apple. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally to prevent burning and ensure that everything is well combined. Reduce heat to low and cook for about 5 minutes, until dates and apple have softened.
Add cooked brown rice and cinnamon, stirring until all the ingredients are fully combined. Continue cooking for about 5 minutes, until rice is warm and soft. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 medium apple, peeled, cored, and diced
